item.title: By: praveent

item.content:encoded:
hi,
Its good but i failed to do same. I am struggling to know why it fails in my case. One more thing is i need to access the this.source property of my data pager control from the callback static method.

i want to though the event for binding.

i will be thankful if u can help me.
